resources.string: The game is in full screen.
The game is in the window.
Delete the saves and restore progress?
The saved games have not changed.
http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.fl3r.boilingbubble - Boiling Bubble puzzle game for Android. Free and open source!

''Boiling Bubble'' is a game created by Armando ''FL3R'' Fiore. 
 Dedicated to the beautiful girl who is always by my side, Anna Rita! 
 Thanks for playing ''Boiling Bubble'', you helped a developer to increase his self-esteem!
